content.rendered:
Customer Service Representative | Bixby, OK Full-Time Customer Service Representative needed for a mid-sized Bixby based company. Company specializes in order fulfillment and internet sales. For almost six years, employer has dedicated strong, high-quality service to the internet shopping experience. Customer Service Representative Preferences:
  • Fast learner with high ethics and standards
  • Friendly phone voice
Customer Service Representative Requirements:
  • 2-3 years customer service, call center or sales experience
Customer Service Representative Hours:
  • Tuesday – Saturday 10:30am – 7:00pm
Customer Service Representative Compensation:
  • $12.00 an hour + commission
  • Great benefits to full-time employees
